verses.verse: And <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> a <S%H7639>lattice<s%> in his upper <S%H5944>chamber<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and was <S%H2470>sick:<s%> and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baal-zebub<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> I shall <S%H2421>recover<s%> of this <S%H4480>disease.<s%> <S%H2483><s%> <S%H2088><s%>

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Is it not <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H1097><s%> there is <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baal-zebub<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron?<s%>

Now <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> that <S%H4296>bed<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou art gone <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> shalt surely <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H4191><s%> And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H1980>departed.<s%>
And when the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> turned <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H4100>Why<s%> are ye <S%H2088>now<s%> turned <S%H7725>back?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, There <S%H5927>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> us, and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us, <S%H1980>Go,<s%> turn <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> you, and <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Is it not <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H1097><s%> there is <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H7971>sendest<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baal-zebub<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron?<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> that <S%H4296>bed<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou art gone <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> shalt surely <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> was he <S%H834>which<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> you, and <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words?<s%>

And they <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H413><s%> him, He was a hairy <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H1167><s%> <S%H8181><s%> and <S%H247>girt<s%> with a <S%H232>girdle<s%> of <S%H5785>leather<s%> about his <S%H4975>loins.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1931>It<s%> is <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite.<s%>

Then the king <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him a <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And he went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2022>hill.<s%> And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Thou <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> hath <S%H1696>said,<s%> Come <S%H3381>down.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> then let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> thee and thy <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And there came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

Again <S%H7725><s%> also he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> hath the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4120>quickly.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> thee and thy <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> a <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty.<s%> And the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3766>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and <S%H2603>besought<s%> <S%H413><s%> him, and <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> let my <S%H5315>life,<s%> and the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came fire <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H784><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and burnt <S%H398>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H2572>fifties<s%> with their <S%H2572>fifties:<s%> therefore let my <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> Go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him: be not <S%H408>afraid<s%> <S%H3372><s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him. And he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Forasmuch <S%H3282>as<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baal-zebub<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> is it not <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H1097><s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of his <S%H1697>word?<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>off<s%> that <S%H4296>bed<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou art gone <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> shalt surely <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

So he <S%H4191>died<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%> And <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> are <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
